author: rbb
msg: Change the prototype for apr_brigade_partition.  This basically allows
the caller some level of control over how buckets are read.  If the
bucket has a -1 length, then we use the mode that is passed in to determine
if we should do a blocking or non-blocking read.
This commit was manufactured by cvs2svn to create tag

author: jwoolley
msg: Move the free function pointer out of the apr_bucket_type_t and into the
apr_bucket struct itself, because the free() function operates on the
apr_bucket and not the bucket's private data [which might change if we morph].

author: jwoolley
msg: Added apr_xml_parse_file() routine and a testxml program.
